name: Mitigation Playbook for Malicious Script Execution Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker gained access to the internal network and executed malicious scripts to download additional payloads.

parallel--dabe6544-76ae-49e1-8f2c-451863.name: Mitigation Actions
parallel--dabe6544-76ae-49e1-8f2c-451863.description: Perform mitigation actions on affected systems.

action--a6c4e2ad-85e0-4c69-bb69-ea1a3e09.name: Kill malicious process
action--a6c4e2ad-85e0-4c69-bb69-ea1a3e09.description: Terminate any processes running the suspicious script.

action--779fb854-4679-45d2-b10b-fbb0e9e7.name: Isolate affected host
action--779fb854-4679-45d2-b10b-fbb0e9e7.description: Take affected host offline to prevent further damage.

action--f2e6a7a5-f043-49c8-978b-063a4cc1.name: Run malware scan
action--f2e6a7a5-f043-49c8-978b-063a4cc1.description: Execute a malware scan on the system, loop until clean.

action--2e3dc093-83c4-4724-95ab-e747d0e5.name: Remove unauthorized scripts
action--2e3dc093-83c4-4724-95ab-e747d0e5.description: Delete malicious scripts from the system.

action--c10f79b5-9270-496f-90ee-e5537e9e.name: Notify security team
action--c10f79b5-9270-496f-90ee-e5537e9e.description: Inform the security team about the incident.

commands.command: echo 'Incident detected on host-22' | mail -s 'Security Alert' security-team@abc.org
